info.title: Google Analytics
info.description: Extend the functionality of Google Analytics by accessing profile and reporting data.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Unique table ID for retrieving Analytics data. Table ID is of the form ga:XXXX, where XXXX is the Analytics profile ID. (string)

parameters.name: start-date
parameters.description: Start date for fetching Analytics data. All requests should specify a start date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. (string)

parameters.name: end-date
parameters.description: End date for fetching Analytics data. All requests should specify an end date formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. (string)

parameters.name: metrics
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of Analytics metrics. E.g., 'ga:visits,ga:pageviews'. At least one metric must be specified. (string)

parameters.name: dimensions
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of Analytics dimensions. E.g., 'ga:browser,ga:city'. (string)

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of dimension or metric filters to be applied to Analytics data. (string)

parameters.name: max-results
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

parameters.name: segment
parameters.description: An Analytics advanced segment to be applied to data. (string)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of dimensions or metrics that determine the sort order for Analytics data. (string)

parameters.name: start-index
parameters.description: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Returns Analytics data for a profile.

parameters.name: max-results
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

parameters.name: start-index
parameters.description: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

get.description: Lists all accounts to which the user has access.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Account ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific account ID or '~all', which refers to all the accounts to which the user has access. (string)

parameters.name: webPropertyId
parameters.description: Web property ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific web property ID or '~all', which refers to all the web properties to which the user has access. (string)

parameters.name: profileId
parameters.description: Profile ID for the web properties to retrieve. Can either be a specific profile ID or '~all', which refers to all the profiles to which the user has access. (string)

parameters.name: max-results
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to include in this response. (integer)

parameters.name: start-index
parameters.description: An index of the first entity to retrieve. Use this parameter as a pagination mechanism along with the max-results parameter. (integer, 1+)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.
